name: EA-006-Descartes
description:
Descartes (1596 - 1650 aC), sometimes called "the founder of modern philosophy" and the "father of modern mathematics", is considered one of the most important and influential thinkers in the history of Western thought. It inspired contemporaries and several generations of later philosophers; much of the philosophy written since then has been a reaction to his works or to authors supposedly influenced by him.

Digital Watercolor Vector Illustration made in Adobe Photoshop, 1200x1200px, 200dpi, JPEG
